tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    message_content TEXT,
    message_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_encrypted BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    encrypted_messages TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    medical_history TEXT,
    encrypted_files BLOB
);

CREATE TABLE PatientMessages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    message_text VARCHAR,
    message_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FileShares (
    share_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    file_name VARCHAR,
    file_url VARCHAR,
    share_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Providers (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR,
    provider_email VARCHAR,
    provider_phone VARCHAR,
    provider_specialty VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
  message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id UUID NOT NULL,
  receiver_id UUID NOT NULL,
  message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Files (
  file_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  file_size INT NOT NULL,
  file_path TEXT NOT NULL,
  uploaded_by UUID NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  message_text TEXT,
  message_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Files (
  file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR,
  file_extension VARCHAR,
  file_size INT,
  file_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE Permissions (
  permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  can_access_messages BOOLEAN,
  can_access_files BOOLEAN
);
